result.execSummary:
The defendant Larry C. Gag was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Defendant Larry C. Gag in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty O'Rourke says DE has paid the $443.00 costs already paid.  State states agreement is costs of $443.00.  Atty O'Rourke agrees.  Court sentences DE to costs only of $443.00.  Those are paid in full.

Defendant Larry C. Gag in court with attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty O'Rourke states matter is resolved and states agreement.  Plea to Ct 1 today and schedule sentencing out.  Costs of $443.00 to be agreed upon and that is paid today by money order.  State is in agreement.  DE also agrees.  Atty O'Rourke enters NC plea.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Sentencing set out.  Bond continued.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Debra Van Wormer O'Rourke in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Auth filed and approved.    Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial Br. 1.  Bond continues.

Defendant Larry C. Gag in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE states he hasn't had time to get counsel yet.  Court advises DE re: right to counsel and application for PD appt if he qualifies.  Court resets.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 05-08-2015 09:15 am.
Return date at 05-21-2015 01:00 pm.

Defendant Larry C. Gag appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State request $500.00 cash bond.  Attorney ORourke request signature bond.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date. $250.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:   Absolute sobriety.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 8, 2015 at 09:15 am.  Return date scheduled for May 21, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
